tool_description: English dictionary API providing an access to data of over 800 000 English lexical entries, such as words, phrasal verbs, multiword expressions etc. Use the API to get word definitions, usage examples, pronunciations, synonyms and antonyms or for text processing (lemmatization, morpheme segmentation, root word extraction, word inflections).
name: Lingua Robot
title: Lingua Robot

api_list.name: Entry
api_list.description: Retrieve data related to the specified entry, such as word or phrasal verb. The data includes meanings, pronunciations, lemmas, normalized lemmas etc.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lingua-robot.p.rapidapi.com/language/v1/entries/en/example"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lingua-robot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lingua-robot.p.rapidapi.com/language/v1/entries/en/{entry}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lingua-robot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
